titleInfo.title: Excerpt from the Hillbilly Roundup radio program - KRLD - 1949-05-25 - Part 1

mods.accessCondition: This audio file is the property of the Country Music Hall of Fame® and Museum and may be protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. mods.abstract: Part one of an excerpt from the Hillbilly Roundup radio program, broadcast on May 25, 1949, hosted by Johnny Hicks on KRLD (Dallas, Tex.). [Part two can be found at TR004134_1]

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
